hero.title: Right to Information Act
hero.headline: Access Information, Empower Citizens
hero.description: NARA is committed to transparency and accountability under the Right to Information Act No. 12 of 2016. Access all RTI forms, guidelines, and downloadable documents to exercise your right to information.

officers.description: Contact our designated RTI officers for information requests

steps.title: Download RTI-01 Form
steps.description: Download and fill the Information Application form (RTI-01)

steps.title: Submit Your Request
steps.description: Submit the filled form via email, post, or in person to the Information Officer

steps.title: Receive Acknowledgement
steps.description: You will receive an acknowledgement (RTI-02) within 3 working days

steps.title: Get Information
steps.description: Information will be provided within 14 working days (extendable to 21 days)

steps.title: Appeal if Needed
steps.description: If unsatisfied, you can appeal using RTI-10 form within 30 days

cta.title: Need Information from NARA?
